ubs.About: We want to create superior value for our clients, shareholders and employees.

He shared how he was initially worried that using a hearing aid would tarnish his image and that one of the joys of his life is riding his motorcycle with his wife. He believed his hearing loss was making it difficult to ride safely. Brett claimed the process of getting his hearing aids from Listen Lively was simple, and his confidence soared because of it.

rippling.About: Rippling is a single platform that can help your business manage all of its employee data and operations, no matter its size. They offer compliance and HR services, payroll administration, COBRA administration, and more.

Testimonials.Testimonial: For years I wondered which company in the enterprise space would have the vision to challenge Microsoft, whose holistic view was always more appealing than even the best siloed SaaS apps. Rippling paints a vision of a single source-of-truth for everything employee-related in a company--and a future where Rippling is employers' one-stop shop, impressive in breadth and depth.

Testimonials.testimonial: Pumpkin has been so helpful and responsive any time I have questions about claims. They put your pet first and customer service is consistently outstanding.
Testimonials.name: Renee M

Testimonials.testimonial: After immense research, I signed up with Pumpkin when I first got my puppy almost 2 years ago. Great website, online chat, customer service. Filing claims could not be easier. Very happy customer here. Get this for your pup and your peace of mind!
Testimonials.name: Terry C

Testimonials.testimonial: Pumpkin insurance is a lifesaver!! My dog needed emergency surgery, of course it happens to be during Christmas time! I paid, filed my claim and got reimbursed within a week! Customer service was sweet and caring, I highly recommend!

Testimonials.name: Rachel Baldwin
Testimonials.testimonial: When an EF-2 tornado touched down in Greensboro, McGriff quickly responded to provide relief for our community. We also made care packages and walked door to door in the hardest hit areas to deliver food and a smiling face to folks who needed it most.

Testimonials.name: Fran Harris
Testimonials.testimonial: Military Missions in Action is an organization focused on providing all types of housing items to previously homeless Veterans. Serving with this group as a volunteer allowed me show appreciation and respect for those that have sacrificed for our country. It was a rewarding experience and I look forward to future opportunities to volunteer with this organization.

Testimonials.name: Dorie Liucci
Testimonials.testimonial: In 2020, we focused on remote, socially distanced activities due to COVID-19. For example, we packed over 750 lunch kits for Kids' Meals, which delivers lunches to children under age 6 in the Houston area. When we delivered the lunch kits, they expressed how grateful they were for our contribution, since the number of children in their program has nearly doubled during the pandemic. Even when we're physically distanced, we can still work together to make a difference in our community.

Industries & Segments: Executive, Professional, Cyber, and Transactional Risk

Testimonials.name: Steven
Testimonials.testimonial: I continuously bring up Caliber when people around me ask what the secret was to getting this lean. The accountability, tools, and knowledge you've provided have been life-changing!

Testimonials.name: Victoria
Testimonials.testimonial: I feel more toned and happy with what I've been seeing in the mirror. Also the fact that I've almost lost 2 inches around my waist!

Testimonials.name: Collin
Testimonials.testimonial: My body has changed REALLY drastically. Abs are starting to show definition all the way down the middle and around the sides, much more definition and vascularity in biceps and triceps, and my back looks noticeably more muscular.

Testimonials.testimonial: I have lost close to 40 lbs, 10% body fat, and 8 inches off my waist. My level of fitness has increased significantly.

razorrank.About: Razor Rank is a premier Digital Marketing agency focused on serving the needs of many different types of companies seeking greater visibility online through a variety of marketing channels. They provide expert solutions and integrated resources for clients seeking superior service and expert advice designed to increase online visibility, traffic, lead generation, and revenue.
razorrank.Mission: Our mission is to exceed your expectations. Whether your business is a complex ecommerce platform or a small-to-medium sized business, our team provides the highest level of communication, and treats your business as it were our own.
razorrank.Customers: Razor Rank serves some of the largest brand names in the country and many medium and smaller-sized companies. Jason Campbell has led optimization for companies such as Toys"R"Us, Dick's Sporting Goods, Orbitz, Avon, Belk Department Stores, Neiman Marcus, Fossil, Gap Inc.

Testimonials.text: I can comfortably say that Razor Rank is one of the best partners I've been lucky enough to work with. The engagement met the goals and expectations of the internal team, leading to an ongoing relationship. Razor Rank provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and thorough.
Testimonials.name: Craig Madden

Testimonials.text: Razor Rank truly embodies the meaning of partner in everything they do. After a global website relaunch, SEO did not tumble and organic revenue didn't drop off... it started growing. The team at Razor Rank was very easy to communicate with, share ideas and strategize with.
Testimonials.name: Ryan Jeffrey

Testimonials.text: They weren't just order-takers, they were partners that could advise of strategy. Over the course of a few months, the team's work catalyzed a 500% increase in qualified leads, a 35% decrease in bounce rate, and a 50% increase in total visitors. Their design capabilities proved to be comparable to major players in the industry.
Testimonials.name: Carl Beauregard

Testimonials.text: They've been, without a doubt, the best partner that I've ever come across. The law firm's organic traffic has doubled for personal injury, and we're ranking number one for over 100 targeted keywords. Razor Rank has produced excellent results, they consistently over-deliver and exceed expectations.
Testimonials.name: Dan Brian
Testimonials.role: Director Digital Marketing, Personal Injury Law Firm

Testimonials.text: They've taken the time to fully understand our very complicated business model and make accurate recommendations. We has seen improvement in our organic traffic, conversion rate, and SEO rankings. Proactivity in providing recommendations is a hallmark of their work.
Testimonials.name: Christine Craig

Testimonials.text: As an interim CMO for Private Equity, I use Razor Rank as my go-to team for organic and paid search. The companies I work with are big brands who expect real results. I can count on Razor Rank to perform at 100% and bring my clients the results they need. I rely on them, and they never let me down.

razorrank.Industries & Segments: Razor Rank focuses on e-commerce retailers, law firms, home services companies, HVAC companies, software companies, and other businesses that rely on lead generation.

forsythbuilding.About: Forsyth Building Company Inc. takes great pride in exceeding our client's expectations no matter how large or small the project. Forsyth Building Company was awarded numerous projects including churches, banks, office buildings, retirement complexes, and civil infrastructure. Forsyth Building Company entered the design-build market in 2000 and has completed several million dollars in design-build contracts. We also have worked as the Construction Manager with several other General Contractors within the state of Alabama.

Testimonials.name: Kenneth L. Joiner
Testimonials.testimonial: Forsyth Building Company Inc. was the general contractor on the referenced project listed above. They were responsible for the entire project build which included the following; clearing & grubbing, grading, sidewalks, asphalt paving, concrete paving, storm drainage, sewer & water. I am the representative for the Owner of the project and all work was performed to construction standards.

Testimonials.name: Timothy M. Lucy
Testimonials.testimonial: Our company was the architect on the New Flyer Vehicle Innovation Center project in Anniston, Alabama which was just recently completed by Forsyth. This project was a total makeover on an existing building and had a very demanding schedule. The construction entailed grading, sewer lines, water lines, drainage, culverts, paving and concrete work. Forsyth was very organized and professional in their approach to the project, and worked with our team seamlessly to deliver the project on time and with a high level of quality.

When we built our Oxford office in 2006, the bids were by invitation only; Forsyth Building Co., Inc. was awarded the job. We could not have been more pleased with the selection. The entire construction process went very smooth as the building was completed on time and on budget. Mr. Harold Forsyth is an extremely professional, ethical and knowledgeable contractor and individual. NobleBank and Trust would certainly use his fine company again.

forsythbuilding.Industries & Segments: Construction, Civil Infrastructure, Commercial, Banks, Churches, Office Buildings, Retirement Complexes

"Hiebing is the first place I've worked - including a string of other agencies - where I truly feel cared for."

Testimonials.name: Vanta
Testimonials.testimonial: Many VC firms produce their own findings on a company or space, but Craft's research was deeper, more nuanced and, ultimately, more helpful than anything else I encountered. It not only speaks to their depth of knowledge, but also how they operate as a leading firm.

Testimonials.testimony: CineSys has been a great asset to CMG, Indianapolis. We had a time sensitive project coming and needed a reliable shared storage solution for our Autodesk color grading, VFX, online, and finish facility. CineSys stepped up to the plate and delivered. Not only did they deliver a SAN solution for our boutique, but they worked to make it fit our budget and timeframe. Since it has been installed, support has been great. I appreciate the staff at CineSys and their dedication to customer support and service.
Testimonials.name: Marc Wellington

Testimonials.testimony: We (Global Team Blue) have been using CineSys for many years. Their knowledge of the industry and trends are a great resource when evaluating new gear. Every purchase is thoroughly vetted and discussed to make sure it meets our needs and also that the company will be around long after the purchase. When it comes to planning and installation. This is where CineSys shines.
Testimonials.name: Dean Dolce
Testimonials.role: Post Production Operations Director, The Park, GTB

Testimonials.testimony: Purchasing the DDP network server by Ardis was the best decision we made this year. We work as a small audio post-production team on fast-turnaround shows, and after demoing the unit we knew we could never go back to the old days of shuttling drives around each of our studios. CineSys was able to send us a demo unit to test out, and the day after we asked for it we were up and running. CineSys has been extremely helpful and responsive, and their team is the most efficient and knowledgeable group I have ever had the pleasure of working with. The DDP paid for itself within months, and it was the best investment in our workflow that our business could have made!

CineSys has always been my go to for so many different services. They help with all my Autodesk purchases and support. They've helped me with hardware storage and network support. I'd highly recommend CineSys for any of your hardware and software needs.
Testimonials.name: Cory L.

Testimonials.testimony: CineSys offers excellent support and services. They are quite knowledgeable with a strong desire to help. Sales team works swiftly and gives out good advice about what works best. We use them for all our Autodesk products such as Flame, Maya and 3DS Max.
Testimonials.name: Steve M.

Testimonials.testimony: CineSys has been our valued partner for many years. We rely on their expertise for software management and tech support on all our Autodesk products. CineSys is very knowledgeable on all aspects of our industry. They're our go to source for information, support and guidance on a range of products we use in our facility. I highly recommend them for all your hardware and software needs.
Testimonials.name: I.R.

Testimonials.testimony: Strong service provider whom is very knowledgeable with the inner workings of the software, the hardware and the intricacies of the Media and Entertainment sector. A valuable partner in providing solutions, and delivering excellence to their customers.

Testimonials.content: TravelStore has been my godsend for years. No matter who I get when I call I get excellent help.

Testimonials.name: Chris V.D.
Testimonials.content: Your terrific responsiveness to the recent incidents affecting the travel industry and our firm is commendable.

Testimonials.name: Natalie R.
Testimonials.content: People who will go that 'extra mile'... Thank you very much for your assistance.

accelerationpartners.About: Acceleration Partners is an integrated global partnerships agency that creates and nurtures partnerships to drive measurable outcomes for clients, across multiple industry verticals.
accelerationpartners.Mission: The company solves for creating exceptional, measurable outcomes for clients by leveraging industry expertise to provide unique solutions to complex challenges.
Customers: Top brands across industries such as Allbirds, Reebok, Swarovski, Cardlytics x Lulus, Crocs, Redbubble, LD Products

Testimonials.testimonial: Acceleration Partners' excellent strategic support and strong local resources have significantly contributed in the growth of our global affiliate program.
Testimonials.name: Swarovski

Testimonials.testimonial: Acceleration Partners is a strong agency with good expertise, timely responses, and a strong knowledge of regional partners.
Testimonials.name: Crocs

Testimonials.testimonial: The team at Acceleration Partners have shown an enormous amount of passion for our brand and mission.
Testimonials.name: Redbubble

Testimonials.testimonial: The AP team has been invaluable during our transition to Impact by helping to organize the entire process.
Testimonials.name: LD Products

Testimonials.testimonial: Through Acceleration Partners' strategic recommendations, the affiliate channel has become a high performing digital marketing channel.
Testimonials.name: Reebok

Industries & Segments: Performance partnerships, affiliate, influencer, performance PR, content, and B2B marketing.

weareamnet.About: We Are Amnet is an independent global creative production studio and leader in Smartshoring; a hybrid model of offshore hubs and regional client service teams. They provide unmatched creative production services across the globe.
weareamnet.Mission: To deliver production certainty for in-house teams, agencies and brands, helping them stay competitive, increase profits, ensure consistent customer experiences, and accelerate growth.

Testimonials.name: Julie Loaiza
Testimonials.testimonial: Offshoring has dramatically and positively changed the way we plan and execute our marketing strategies. It helps us achieve marketing production efficiencies.

Testimonials.name: Marcelo Gandola
Testimonials.testimonial: In today's rapidly growing world of content needs we become more efficient and global by Smartshoring.

neoreach.About: At NeoReach, we've built a platform that solves both of these challenges. Our platform makes it easy for you to find awesome content selected just for you, and earn a fair share of the profit you create for companies by sharing their content.
neoreach.Mission: Personalization of content and getting paid for sharing great content and building an engaged online audience.

walgreensbootsalliance.About: Walgreens Boots Alliance is an integrated healthcare, pharmacy and retail leader serving millions of customers and patients every day, with a 170-year heritage of caring for communities. The company operates over 12,500 locations across the U.S., Europe and Latin America, and plays a critical role in the healthcare ecosystem by dispensing medicines, improving access to health services, and providing health and beauty products.
walgreensbootsalliance.Mission: To create more joyful lives through better health by reimagining local healthcare and well-being for all.
walgreensbootsalliance.Customers: WBA serves millions of customers and patients every day and has a significant presence in the U.S. with large retail chains like Walgreens and Duane Reade.

datadoghq.About: Datadog is a monitoring service for infrastructure and applications.
datadoghq.Mission: Datadog assists customers in optimizing performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness, and helps extract valuable insights from data.

Testimonials.name: Senior Staff Reliability engineer
Testimonials.statement: Datadog is at the core of our observability stack.

chapman.About: Ranked #133 out of 439 top-tier universities, Chapman offers students personalized educational opportunities with a world-class faculty. It is an R2 research institute supporting diverse programs, projects, and centers with over $14M in annual research funding.
chapman.Mission: Chapman rises to the challenges of a changing world through distinctive research and teaching, confronting urgent problems such as food shortages, health care, and environmental impacts.

funny-business.About: Funny Business Agency is an entertainment booking agency that connects clients with comedians and entertainers for corporate events, fundraisers, company retreats, holiday parties, sales meetings, industry conferences, and virtual events.

Testimonials.testimonial: The audience was in stitches the entire time and kept commenting throughout how entertaining/relevant Dwayne was in his performance.
Testimonials.name: Brooke Pothast

Testimonials.testimonial: Working with Funny Business was easy because their team is so responsive. They provided me with a list of options that fit my audience and budget. I ended up with a great comedy show at my event.
Testimonials.name: Meghan Scott

Testimonials.testimonial: We had a fatigued team working remotely, and FBA's talent was able to spark a lot of joy and laughter for us. We're hearing amazing feedback from the team about the event.
Testimonials.name: Stefanie Groner

Testimonials.testimonial: Funny Business Agency was so great to work with! We used Trivia with Budds for our closing virtual event and our attendees had a BLAST! They all commented asking if we could have Ryan join us in-person next year.
Testimonials.name: Erin DeFouw

Testimonials.testimonial: FBA was wonderful to work with, they respond quickly, communicate efficiently and make you feel completely taken care of at all times.
Testimonials.name: Amy Omas

Testimonials.testimonial: Funny Business went above and beyond to accommodate my corporate event request. We had some out-of-the norm stipulations due to corporate policy which they were able to work with us on. Alicia was super attentive to my calls and emails - leaving no questions unanswered.
Testimonials.name: JP Morgan Chase

Testimonials.testimonial: The Funny Business Agency was incredible to work with! They helped send over options of talent to look into as I wasn't sure what exactly I wanted when I initially reached out. We worked together to find a perfect fit.
Testimonials.name: Alice Cox
